CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(echosign_dev1__Status__c), 'Waiting for Counter-Signature', 'Out for Signature', 'Waiting for Counter-Approval', 'Out for Approval', 'Waiting for Counter-Acceptance', 'Out for Acceptance', 'Waiting for Counter-Form-Filling', 'Out for Form-Filling', 'Waiting for Counter-Delivery', 'Out for Delivery', 'Pre-Send', 'Not Yet Sent for Signature', TEXT(echosign_dev1__Status__c))
CustomField.label: Status
